member.name: ILanguageExceptionErrorInfo.GetLanguageException
member.summary: Gets the stored object from the error object.
member.param: The stored object from the error object.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ILanguageExceptionErrorInfo
member.summary: Enables retrieving the pointer stored in the error info with the call to RoOriginateLanguageException.
